abstract: Employees at Piedmont, Ala, auto parts plant owned by Commercial Vehicle Group vote to join United Auto Workers union; cite wage caps and use of temporary workers as reasons for organizing.
lead_paragraph: Workers at an auto parts plant in northeast Alabama cited issues such as wage caps and growing use of temporary workers in their vote to join a labor union.

headline.main: Workers at Alabama Plant Vote to Join the U.A.W.
headline.print_headline: Workers at Alabama Plant Vote to Join the U.A.W.

snippet: Workers at an auto parts plant in northeast Alabama cited issues such as wage caps and growing use of temporary workers in their vote to join a labor union.
